entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Gore Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:14 p.m. EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 7.6Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gore Bay-Manitoulin Airport 8:00 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 7.6°C
Pressure: 100.0 kPa
Visibility: 16 km
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 7.2°C
Wind: ENE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers late this evening and after midnight. A few showers beginning after midnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Amount 5 mm. Temperature steady near plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few showers ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers late in the morning and early afternoon. A few showers beginning in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Temperature steady near plus 5. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
